definition: (once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
dagger-axe/abbr. for 戈瑞[ge1 rui4]/(Tw) abbr. for 戈雷[ge1 lei2]
to put on a play/to perform/fig. to pretend/to feign
large-scale Chinese opera/Beijing opera/major dramatic production (movie, TV series etc)
opera (or role) involving much singing and action/(fig.) highlight/main feature/major activity

sentences.english: He backed the costs of the new play.
sentences.chinese: 他同意承担这出新戏的费用。

sentences.english: He read many books, he went to the theatre, and in the summer he stayed in the country for six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 他读了许多书，去看过戏，在乡间避暑待了六个星期。

sentences.english: It's very long. I think it's three hours long.
sentences.chinese: 这出戏很长，大概有三小时。

sentences.english: The love-drama about talented scholars and beautiful girls is main form of the Yuan opera.
sentences.chinese: 才子佳人爱情戏是元杂剧爱情戏的主要形式。

sentences.english: The play climaxed in the third act.
sentences.chinese: 那出戏在第三幕达到高潮。

sentences.english: 13 emotional drama, I could not act.
The play has a powerful ending.
The play the causes and effects of logical relationship is roughly such.
sentences.chinese: 这出戏的前因后果逻辑关系大致是这样的。

sentences.english: The play did not take in this city.
sentences.chinese: 那出戏在这个城市不卖座。

sentences.english: Luckily the strength of the piece did not depend upon him.
sentences.chinese: 幸好这出戏并不靠他来撑场面。

sentences.english: Love is like a play, your friendship, I have to show.
sentences.chinese: 爱情就像一场戏，你的友情客串，我却倾情演出。

sentences.english: Some people are able to make the puppets appear alive.
sentences.chinese: 有些人能将戏偶舞得栩栩如生。

sentences.english: Shuesik do you know the name of the singer of this song and also the other one in your other Thai clip?
sentences.chinese: 网上有一位泰歌高手上载了整部戏的歌曲，还有歌名。

sentences.english: The play succeeded thanks to the wonderful performance of all the .
sentences.chinese: 由于演员们的精彩表演，这部戏获得了成功。

sentences.english: And it was the poems composing in play itself to get considerable development in the Tang Dynasty too.
sentences.chinese: 并且戏作诗本身也是在唐代得到长足的发展的。
